title: Pretty Spiteful
description: She wants our protection, but her safety comes with a price.Emilia Harrison. The girl I attended Pacific Prep with. My sister’s best friend. The greatest sex I’ve ever had.I never expected to see her again after graduation, so when she shows up in my kitchen in the middle of the night, I don’t know what to think.Apparently there’s some psycho after her and she needs my help. My family owns a private security firm, but I can’t protect her from Wilder.And maybe I don’t want to. Her presence brings up old feelings I don’t want to confront. It's easier to blame her for the past than face the truth.With all of us living under one roof, it’s only a matter of time until tensions reach a crescendo, and this time, none of us will escape.Welcome to Ridgeway, Em, where you will have to survive more than just your stalker.
author: R.A. Smyth
